secText:
Lesson:
1. Define and calculate [OBJ:expsec_h559:centripetal force].
2. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_banked_curve_find_theta_question:draw a free-body diagram] for an object moving in circular motion.
3. Work through a sample problem to [OBJ:app_centrifugal_hypothesis_question:determine the forces acting on a person] riding a roller coaster.
4. Apply the concepts of centripetal force to [OBJ:pwsec_h560:artificial gravity].
